title: CT Special.Forces - Nemesis.Strike
description:
You belong to an elite force fighting against global counter-terrorism. Your team is made up of two crack agents poised to react to any threat. Stealth Owl is an infiltration expert, whose skills are accuracy and skydiving. Raptor uses weapons of mass destruction and favours close combat. Your main objective is to dismantle the NEMESIS network and retrieve the stolen technology. But by changing the chemical properties of certain proteins, the terrorists have made their fighters much more aggressive...

OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 32,& 64bit

No major rig required for this game.


IGN Rating:
 <a href="
http://au.ign.com/games/special-forces-nemesis-strike/pc-679423" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://au.ign.com/games/special-forces-nemesis-strike/pc-679423</a>


My Screens:
 <a href="
http://bayimg.com/madkkaafK" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bayimg.com/madkkaafK</a>


You can use Xpadder (included) to setup your gamepad. 

I have already made a profile for the Xbox360 controller.


I have included a save file called "FIRE", 

this gets you to the first mission without the need to go 

through the training modules, though I recommend doing the training 

if you haven't played this game before.


NOTE 1:

If the screen is black at start up and doesn't seem to be doing anything,

press Esc, or START button on the Xbox360 controller.


NOTE 2:

Sometimes when shutting the game down, there seems to be a lag, or a glitch 

with the PC; not sure why but it's not harmful, just press Ctrl + Alt + Delete

to go to task manager and shut down the "CTFS".exe.

If your PC still seems to lag then just reboot; the game is worth any minor 

hassles like this.


Extract with WinRAR or 7zip


Please seed for others
